word: The people of God have a high and holy calling. They are Christ\92s representatives. Paul addresses the church in Corinth as those who are \93sanctified in Christ Jesus, called to be saints.\94 . . . Says Peter, \93Ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light.\94
